textAfterTable: 9 Songs Customer Reviews Greatness… as expected.           by jtrue.com Thanks guys. I bought on faith, glad i did!!! Typical greatness from you guys. Absolutely stunning album, and greatness from the Bombay Dub Orchestra           by Angrie birds I’ve been listening to BDO’s work for a while now, and I must say, truly phenomenal work as usual. The voices, music, arrangements, layout truly hits “natural frequencies of the soul”… I cannot wait for their next album. My favorite is Songs from the Seven Towers… what a vocal and instrumental performance! This is mastery of art! Keep up the great work BDO! As a listener, I’m sure you if you’re into this genre of music, you will not be disappointed. Great stuff.. cannot say enough! Biography Genre: World Years Active: '00s, '10s Bombay Dub Orchestra are not from Bombay, nor are they really a dub act, either, or
